detailsData.title: Trusted Advisor Relationship
detailsData.content: Committed to restoring and elevating the traditional Trusted Advisor relationship between client and attorney.

detailsData.title: Multi-disciplinary Experience
detailsData.content: Former partners at a large law firm, bringing diverse experience to clients' business challenges.

detailsData.title: Fresh Approach to Law
detailsData.content: Taking a fresh approach to the practice of law, providing clients with the insight they need to make informed decisions.

address: 401 B Street, Suite 2220, San Diego, CA 92101
subHeading: RESTORING TRUST BETWEEN LAWYERS & BUSINESS PROFESSIONALS
valueProp: Witham Mahoney & Abbott is a new generation of legal counsel focused on helping a new generation of businesses and professionals achieve success. We are committed to restoring and elevating the traditional Trusted Advisor relationship between client and attorney while taking a fresh approach to the practice of law.
openHours: Hours may vary, contact for details

testimonalData.text: Matt is my go-to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden

testimonalData.text: Matt is a strategic thinker and really knows how to analyze and formulate a litigation game plan.
testimonalData.author: Phil Regan

testimonalData.text: I heard other players saying amazing things about Matt and now I know for myself that it's all true as he never quits until the catch is made!
testimonalData.author: Endy Chavez, NY Mets Player
